payload:
# POINDEXTER (dex) — Your Nerdy AI Orchestration Genius

## Mission

Build **Poindexter** — a self-contained, single-user system for orchestrating 25+ concurrent Claude Code sessions on a local machine. Poindexter is the brilliant nerd who manages your AI workforce: decomposing tasks, assigning specialized "hats" to sessions, managing git worktrees for isolation, and building complete, deployed applications using a curated toolbelt of cloud services.

**Nickname:** `dex`  
**Personality:** H... [truncated, 44190 chars total]

Initialize Go module and create backend directory structure. Steps: 1) Run 'go mod init github.com/liranmauda/dex' 2) Create directories: cmd/dex/, cmd/dex-cli/, internal/api/handlers/, internal/api/middleware/, internal/api/websocket/, internal/auth/, internal/db/migrations/, internal/db/models/, internal/git/, internal/github/, internal/orchestrator/, internal/session/, internal/task/, internal/toolbelt/, prompts/hats/, deploy/systemd/, scripts/ 3) Create placeholder main.go files in cmd/dex/ and cmd/dex-cli/
Go module initialized, backend directory structure created, placeholder main.go files added, code compiles

Reviewed initial setup: 1) Remove unnecessary os.Exit(0) from main.go files, 2) PRIORITY: Create .gitignore before committing (binaries in root), 3) Empty dirs need .gitkeep or code to persist in git, 4) Still need config.yaml, toolbelt.yaml templates, and frontend setup to complete checkpoint 1.1
Create .gitignore (CRITICAL - binaries in root), remove os.Exit(0) from both main.go files, verify build. See scratchpad for exact file contents.
Created .gitignore, removed os.Exit(0) from both main.go files, build verified
code review: .gitignore good, main.go clean, build passes. Action items: 1) rm binaries from root, 2) add config templates, 3) setup frontend, 4) consider .gitkeep files
Remove compiled binaries from root: rm dex dex-cli. These are gitignored but should be cleaned up. After removal, verify with ls to confirm they're gone.
Removed compiled binaries dex and dex-cli from root directory
Binary cleanup approved. Remaining: config templates, frontend setup, .gitkeep for prompts/hats/
Create config.yaml.example, toolbelt.yaml.example, and prompts/hats/.gitkeep. See scratchpad for exact file contents.
Created config.yaml.example, toolbelt.yaml.example, and prompts/hats/.gitkeep
Config templates approved. Minor suggestions: tilde path expansion note, optional dollar_budget/logging/auth sections for later. Next: setup frontend with Bun+React+Tailwind.
Setup frontend: Bun + React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind. See scratchpad for detailed 7-step instructions.
Frontend setup complete: React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind v4. Dev server and build verified working.
Frontend review: APPROVED. React 19 + Vite 7 + Tailwind v4 setup is solid. Minor: update title from 'frontend' to 'Poindexter'. Checkpoint 1.1 COMPLETE. Ready for Checkpoint 1.2 (Tailscale HTTPS).
Step 1: Update frontend/index.html title from 'frontend' to 'Poindexter'. Step 2: Check Tailscale status with 'which tailscale' and 'tailscale status'. Report findings for Checkpoint 1.2 assessment.
title updated, tailscale not installed
title fix verified, tailscale not installed - checkpoint 1.1 complete, 1.2 blocked on user action
implement internal/auth/bip39.go - BIP39 passphrase generation with go-bip39 dependency
bip39.go created - GeneratePassphrase, GenerateRecoveryPhrase, ValidateMnemonic, MnemonicToSeed - build verified
bip39.go approved - clean BIP39 implementation, build passes, ready for ed25519.go
implement internal/auth/ed25519.go - DeriveKeypair, Sign, Verify using HKDF key derivation from BIP39 seed
ed25519.go created with DeriveKeypair, Sign, Verify using HKDF - build verified
ed25519.go approved - clean HKDF-based key derivation, Sign/Verify correct, ready for jwt.go
implement jwt.go - GenerateToken, ValidateToken, RefreshToken using Ed25519 signing with golang-jwt/jwt/v5
jwt.go created with GenerateToken, ValidateToken, RefreshToken using Ed25519 - Checkpoint 1.3 complete
jwt.go approved - Ed25519 JWT implementation correct, Checkpoint 1.3 complete, ready for 1.4 SQLite

Create internal/db/sqlite.go with DB struct, Open(), Migrate() and 7 migration SQL statements for users, projects, tasks, task_dependencies, sessions, session_checkpoints, approvals tables. Use modernc.org/sqlite driver.
internal/db/sqlite.go created with DB struct, Open(), Migrate() and 7 migration statements - build verified
sqlite.go approved - schema correct, 7 tables with indexes, suggest enabling FK pragma, ready for CRUD models
Add FK pragma to sqlite.go line 27, create internal/db/models.go with User/Project/Task/Session/Approval structs and status constants
FK pragma added to sqlite.go line 27, models.go created with 6 model structs (User, Project, Task, TaskDependency, Session, SessionCheckpoint, Approval) and 17 status/type constants - build verified
sqlite.go FK pragma approved, models.go 7 structs + 17 constants approved - suggest adding ID generation helper and autonomy level constants later - ready for CRUD implementation
implement User CRUD in internal/db/users.go with NewID helper, CreateUser, GetUserByID, GetUserByPublicKey, UpdateUserLastLogin, DeleteUser, GetOrCreateUser - see scratchpad for full code
users.go created with NewID, NewPrefixedID, CreateUser, GetUserByID, GetUserByPublicKey, UpdateUserLastLogin, DeleteUser, GetOrCreateUser - build verified

users.go approved - clean CRUD with ID generation, proper error handling, GetOrCreateUser for auth flow - minor notes on rand error handling and race condition acceptable for single-user - ready for Project/Task CRUD

implement Project CRUD in internal/db/projects.go - CreateProject, GetProjectByID, ListProjects, UpdateProject, UpdateProjectGitHub, UpdateProjectServices, DeleteProject, GetProjectByRepoPath - follows users.go patterns with JSON handling for ProjectServices
projects.go created with CreateProject, GetProjectByID, ListProjects, UpdateProject, UpdateProjectGitHub, UpdateProjectServices, DeleteProject, GetProjectByRepoPath - build verified
projects.go approved - clean CRUD with JSON services handling, proper error patterns, missing rows.Err() check is minor - ready for Task CRUD

Implement Task CRUD in internal/db/tasks.go - CreateTask, GetTaskByID, list methods, update methods, delete, and dependency management (AddTaskDependency, GetTaskBlockers, IsTaskReady). See scratchpad for full code.

tasks.go created with CreateTask, GetTaskByID, ListTasksByProject, ListTasksByStatus, ListReadyTasks, UpdateTaskStatus, UpdateTaskHat, UpdateTaskWorktree, UpdateTaskPRNumber, UpdateTaskUsage, DeleteTask, AddTaskDependency, RemoveTaskDependency, GetTaskBlockers, GetTasksBlockedBy, IsTaskReady - build verified
tasks.go approved - solid CRUD with dependency management, minor suggestions: add self-reference check in AddTaskDependency, consider cycle detection at service layer
add self-reference check to AddTaskDependency, create sessions.go with full Session CRUD
added self-reference check to AddTaskDependency, created sessions.go with full Session and SessionCheckpoint CRUD
sessions.go approved - full Session/SessionCheckpoint CRUD, self-reference check in tasks.go, follows established patterns - ready for Approval CRUD
implement approvals.go CRUD - CreateApproval, GetApprovalByID, ListPendingApprovals, ApproveApproval, RejectApproval, DeleteApproval plus helpers - last entity before DB layer complete

approvals.go created with CreateApproval, GetApprovalByID, ListPendingApprovals, ListApprovalsByTask, ListApprovalsBySession, ListApprovalsByType, ListApprovalsByStatus, ApproveApproval, RejectApproval, DeleteApproval, DeleteApprovalsByTask, DeleteApprovalsBySession, CountPendingApprovals, CountPendingApprovalsByTask, HasPendingApproval - build verified

approvals.go approved - clean CRUD with helper pattern, proper NULL handling, state machine for resolve. Minor notes: add comment for internal whereClause, consider approval type constants later, no pagination yet but OK for now
Integrate db init into main.go - add flag parsing, db.Open, db.Migrate, verify with test.db
db init integrated into main.go with flag parsing, db.Open, db.Migrate - verified with test.db
main.go db init approved - flag parsing, db.Open, db.Migrate verified - all 7 tables created with indices - WAL mode enabled - Checkpoint 1.4 COMPLETE - ready for 1.5 Basic API
Create Echo API server with health check endpoint - add echo dependency, create internal/api/server.go, update main.go with server startup and graceful shutdown
Echo API server with health check endpoint created
API server approved - Echo with health check, TLS support, graceful shutdown - ready for auth middleware
implement JWT auth middleware - create internal/api/middleware/auth.go with JWTAuth and GetUserID, update server.go with protected routes and /me endpoint
JWT auth middleware implemented - created internal/api/middleware/auth.go with JWTAuth and GetUserID, updated server.go with protected routes group and /me endpoint

JWT auth middleware approved - clean Echo middleware pattern, proper Bearer token parsing, error differentiation, protected routes working - minor notes on errors.Is vs == and WWW-Authenticate header - Checkpoint 1.5 nearly complete
Add static frontend file serving to complete Checkpoint 1.5 - update server.go with StaticDir config and SPA routing
Added static frontend file serving to server.go with StaticDir config and SPA routing - Checkpoint 1.5 complete
Static file serving approved - clean SPA routing, optional StaticDir, API routes protected - Checkpoint 1.5 COMPLETE - Phase 1 code COMPLETE - ready for Phase 2 toolbelt clients

Phase 2 Start - Checkpoint 2.1 Toolbelt Configuration - Create internal/toolbelt/config.go with service config types, LoadConfig with env var expansion, and Status method - add yaml.v3 dependency - verify build
Created internal/toolbelt/config.go with service config types, LoadConfig with env var expansion, and Status method. Added yaml.v3 dependency. Build verified.
toolbelt config.go approved - 11 services, env var expansion, Status method correct - minor suggestions: log unexpanded vars, no blockers
Create toolbelt.go struct, add /api/v1/toolbelt/status endpoint, wire into main.go - completing checkpoint 2.1
toolbelt.go struct created, /api/v1/toolbelt/status endpoint added, wired into main.go via -toolbelt flag
toolbelt implementation approved - checkpoint 2.1 complete, minor items: nil config fallback duplication, no config validation yet, ready for checkpoint 2.2 github client

checkpoint 2.2: create internal/toolbelt/github.go with GitHubClient wrapping google/go-github - methods: CreateRepo, ListRepos, CreateIssue, UpdateIssue, CloseIssue, CreatePR, MergePR, SetupActions, Ping - add dependency and wire into Toolbelt struct

created internal/toolbelt/github.go with GitHubClient wrapping go-github: Ping, CreateRepo, ListRepos, CreateIssue, UpdateIssue, CloseIssue, CreatePR, MergePR, SetupActions - wired into Toolbelt struct
github.go: 3 issues - dead base64 code (lines 306/332), redundant owner fallback in CloseIssue, empty Labels slice. Checkpoint 2.2 functionally complete.
Fix github.go: remove dead base64 code (lines 306/332), remove redundant owner fallback in CloseIssue, improve Labels handling. Verify build passes.
github.go: removed dead base64 code, redundant owner fallback, improved Labels handling; build passes
github.go cleanup approved - dead base64 code removed, redundant owner fallback removed, Labels handling improved; build+vet pass; Checkpoint 2.2 COMPLETE; ready for Checkpoint 2.3 (Fly.io Client)
Checkpoint 2.3: Create fly.go with FlyClient - Ping, CreateApp, DeleteApp, GetApp, Deploy, SetSecrets, GetStatus, GetLogs, Scale; update toolbelt.go to initialize Fly client
fly.go: FlyClient with Ping, CreateApp, DeleteApp, GetApp, Deploy, SetSecrets, GetStatus, GetLogs, Scale; toolbelt.go updated

FlyClient review: 11 observations. BUGS: (1) range-over-int requires Go 1.22+, (2) hardcoded 2s sleep in destroyMachine is fragile, (3) Ping misses GraphQL errors. EDGE CASES: (4) Scale to 0 undocumented, (5) createMachineFromConfig fails silently with no image, (6) listMachines nil vs empty. CODE QUALITY: (7) double error wrapping, (8) anonymous nested struct, (9) parseResponse could be shared. See scratchpad for details.

Fix FlyClient issues per observer feedback: (1) Replace hardcoded 2s sleep in destroyMachine with waitForMachineState polling, (2) Add GraphQL error checking to Ping, (3) Document Scale to 0 behavior, (4) Add image validation in createMachineFromConfig, (5) Ensure listMachines returns empty slice not nil, (6) Fix double error wrapping. See scratchpad for implementation details.

FlyClient fixes: (1) destroyMachine uses polling instead of 2s sleep, (2) Ping checks GraphQL errors, (3) Scale documents count=0 behavior, (4) createMachineFromConfig validates image, (5) listMachines returns empty slice not nil, (6) removed double error wrapping in 5 functions

FlyClient fixes approved: (1) destroyMachine polling correct with 30s timeout, (2) Ping GraphQL error check correct, (3) Scale docs clear, (4) image validation correct, (5) empty slice fix correct, (6) double wrapping removed in 5 functions - all verified with go build and go vet - ready for next task
Implement Cloudflare client (internal/toolbelt/cloudflare.go): DNS CRUD, R2 storage, KV namespace, Pages deployment. Update toolbelt.go to include CloudflareClient. Verify with go build && go vet.
cloudflare client implemented: DNS CRUD, R2 storage, KV namespace, Pages deployment; toolbelt.go updated; go build and go vet pass
cloudflare client: approved with 1 bug (Ping never uses result var), suggest fix before continuing
Fix Ping() bug in cloudflare.go - assign parseCloudflareResponse return value to result variable
Fixed Ping() bug: assigned parseCloudflareResponse return value to result variable
Cloudflare Ping() fix approved - result variable now correctly assigned. Checkpoint 2.4 COMPLETE. Ready for Checkpoint 2.5 (Neon Client)

Implement Neon client (Checkpoint 2.5): Create internal/toolbelt/neon.go with Project, Branch, Database operations and GetConnectionString. Follow Cloudflare client pattern. Update toolbelt.go to integrate.
Neon client implemented with Project/Branch/Database/Endpoint/Role operations and GetConnectionString
Neon client review: 4 issues found

Fix URL encoding in neon.go connection strings: 1) Add net/url import, 2) Use url.QueryEscape(password) in GetConnectionString line 843-848, 3) Same for GetPoolerConnectionString line 908-913. Then proceed to Checkpoint 2.6 (Upstash Client).
Fixed URL encoding in neon.go: added net/url import, used url.QueryEscape(password) in GetConnectionString and GetPoolerConnectionString
URL encoding fix verified: net/url imported, url.QueryEscape applied in both GetConnectionString and GetPoolerConnectionString. Build passes. Checkpoint 2.5 complete.

Implement Checkpoint 2.6: Upstash Client - Create internal/toolbelt/upstash.go with Redis CRUD, GetCredentials, and QStash queue operations. Update config.go with QStashToken field and toolbelt.go with Upstash initialization. Details in scratchpad.

Upstash client implemented: Redis CRUD (Create/Get/List/Delete/Rename), GetCredentials helper, QStash queue operations (Create/Get/List/Delete/Pause/Resume/Update). Config updated with QStashToken field. Toolbelt.go updated with Upstash client initialization. Build passes.

Upstash client review: solid implementation with good separation of Redis and QStash APIs. Issues: (1) TLS default is false in CreateRedisOptions but should default true for security, (2) QStash queue name not URL-escaped which could cause issues with special chars, (3) Missing Ping check for QStash token validity, (4) toolbelt.yaml.example missing qstash_token field. All minor - code is production-ready with these small fixes.
Fix 3 Upstash issues: (1) TLS default to true using *bool, (2) URL-escape queue names, (3) Add PingQStash function
Fixed 3 Upstash issues: TLS *bool default true, URL-escape queue names, added PingQStash
Upstash fixes approved with 2 minor suggestions: add unit tests, consider rate limiting for Redis APIs
Implement Resend email client for Checkpoint 2.7
Implemented Resend email client for Checkpoint 2.7
Resend client reviewed - well-structured, follows established patterns, minor suggestions noted
Implement BetterStackClient for monitoring/logging - see scratchpad for detailed implementation instructions

## Reason
max_iterations

## Status
Stopped at iteration limit.

## Summary
- Iterations: 100
- Duration: 1h 50m 31s
- Exit code: 2
